subject: Horizontal scroll errors in swingui ?
msgSnippet: Hi, In JUnit 3.4 swingui runner, I did not find a way to scroll horizontally the errors, the only way I have to see the end of line is by maximizing the window
messageBody:
Hi,

In JUnit 3.4 swingui runner, I did not find a way to scroll
horizontally the errors, the only way I have to see the end of line
is by maximizing the window which is not enough sometimes.
Here is a link to a picture that exhibits the problem:

http://gael.marziou.free.fr/tmp/junit_scroll.gif

Is this something already known?

Thanks,

Gael
